name: Dice Slayer (VinciDa)
description:
Dice Slayer was made in 48 hours, for the GMTK 2022 game jam, with the them of 'Roll the dice'.

In dice slayer your goal is to fight and survive through waves of enemies. Though to make it more dicey, your weapon will be randomly chosen whenever you run out of ammo. (Only 2 weapons are available, due to running out of time :D)

All models, art and programming was done in the 48 hour jam period.
Sound and music is from the Unity assets store.
